title: Stardust - June 2016 (gnv64)
description:
Stardust - June 2016
English | 150 pages | True PDF | 39.5 mb

Ruling the roost for over 40 years, Stardust is Indiaâ€™s numero uno Bollywood magazine! Stardust gets you all the 

latest filmy gossip, masala, break-ups and make-ups, previews and reviews, posters and more!

CONTENTS
COVER STORY - In 2013, when ALIA BHATT sailed through the gates of Bâ€™town, people thought she was just another 

star-kid who had things set on a platter. But with her second film, she proved that she is not just the rosycheeked, 

dimple-chinned industry child, but a talent to reckon with, and something she has been steadily building on with 

each release of hers. Today, Alia is at the top of her league, her kitty overflowing with juicy projects & films.

TIGER SHROFF has come a long way with his dance moves, stunts and more importantly, his goal to enter Bollywood and 

carve a niche for himself.

The girl-next-door is one of the labels attached to this actress on screen. With her voice, she won hearts, she 

surprised everyone last year with her dance moves, and now, with her action chops, she simply mesmerized the 

audience. Though she comes across as bubbly and chirpy, SHRADDHA KAPOOR is actually very calm, composed, sweet and 

petite.

After Masaan, Richa has paraded the title of an actress who knows her craft, but with Cabaret, Richa plans to zip 

loose talk and prove herself a glam diva and a competent actress. Richa chadha is simply the most honest actress...

Just around the time her much awaited release, the biopic (technically a docu-drama) with Emraan Hashmi, Azhar), was 

to hit the screens, NARGIS FAKHRI sent the industry folk into a tizzy by doing a disappearing act. Stardust airs a 

take on the happenings, as we try to get to the bottom of it all.

AMRITA RAO was the innocent face of Bollywood for a while, and since her debut, men have been smitten by her. She is 

gorgeous, vivacious, spontaneous and witty to the core. She became a household name after she became the Rajshrisâ€™ 

bahu with Vivah and ever since, in every encounter with fans, they cannot forget the reel character she portrayed. 

Such is the persona she possesses. Whilst the audience want to see their favourite actress more often, she is very 

picky about roles that befit her, and wisely so. She is currently visible on television, essaying the younger role 

of a legendary singer, and has touched millions of hearts once again.

SIKANDAR KHER was seventh or eighth assistant to director Sanjay Leela Bhansali, on his millennial magnum opus 

Devdas. 2016 is the Sikandar shining year. His double role and perfect comic timing were much appreciated in the 

film Tere Bin Laden â€“ Dead or Alive, earlier this year. Plus heâ€™s in a couple of really big television serials, in 

interesting and pivotal parts. He now stands sleek and sharper if anything, has the added wisdom of years and 

experience, and is raring to go with good work...

RAM GOPAL VARMA is a classic example of how dizzying heights of success can also plummet to the depths of failure. 

After being ranked as one of the finest filmmakers, his latter body of work was questioned and ridiculed for its 

inanity and lack of substantial content. However, he has no qualms in admitting the mistakes heâ€™s made and all the 

impulsive decisions taken. Selfassured and devoid of emotions, in his second innings, he is back with a yet another 

gruesome thriller Veerappan...

STARDUST STYLE
CASUAL LOOKS - Check out Deepika in some of her coolest casual avatars.
RED CARPET LOOKS - Take a look at the actress as she mesmerises in extravagant designer creations.
LOOK TEST - Hereâ€™s a review of her memorable on-screen ensembles.
ACCESSORIES - The actress shows us how to jazz up an outfit with these add-ons.
FITNESS - An insight into Deepikaâ€™s diet and exercise regime.
CARNAMA - Check out the luxurious wheels that Ms. Padukone owns.
QUOTE ROOM - Hereâ€™s what the actress has to say about all rumours surrounding her life.
